properties.label: Big Fork Ridge
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, extending NE from Cataloochee Balsam; a Balsam Mountain summit between Rough Fork and Caldwell Fork. Center near lat. 35°35'40" N., long. 83°07'30" W.

properties.label: Big Ridge
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park. A short spur of Big Fork Ridge extending SE near lat. 35°34'50" N., long. 83°08' W.

properties.label: Horse Pen Ridge
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, a spur extending NW from Cataloochee Divide; its center is near lat. 35°35'40" N., long. 83°05'07" W.

properties.label: Little Ridge
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, a short spur of Big Fork Ridge extending ne; center near lat. 35°35'38" N., long. 83°08'28" W.

properties.label: Tough Ridge
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, a spur extending NW from Cataloochee Divide; center near lat. 35°35'05" N., long. 83°05'54" W., between Clontz Branch and McKee Branch.
